fieldset.label_en: Find Open Change Requests by Document Coordinator

combo.assistance_dql: select i_all_users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_coordinators' ENABLE(ROW_BASED))
